name: Breakyo
description:
A new Type of Classic Brick-Breaking game that breaks all conventions about Brick-Breakers, Destroy Bricks while growing big and eating masses, Generate your own bricks to manipulate space and Slow time to manage multiple Balls.

Key-features :

Grow-Big to eat smaller masses or Split mass for faster speeds

Shoot-masses to destroy Bricks from a far

Slow-time to keep up with the action

Place-Bricks to manipulate the directions
